    Search NPI by Taxonomy

    search_by_taxonomy.Rd

    This function performs a search on the NPI registry for a list of taxonomy descriptions and returns a combined dataframe of results. It processes the returned data and cleans up unnecessary fields.

    search_by_taxonomy(taxonomy_to_search)

    Arguments

    taxonomy_to_search

    A character vector of taxonomy descriptions to search for in the NPI registry.

    Value

    A dataframe of cleaned NPI data, filtered by taxonomy and other criteria.

    Contents

    Developed by Tyler Muffly.
